attributes.action: Make NHS dentist treatment free for all
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why are NHS dentist patients treatment not treated the same as if they were a hospital patient, free?

Our teeth are very important to us all and patients end up putting their health at risk as they just can't afford to pay for the dentist work that they require as just so expensive.

NHS dentist treatment should be free for everyone.
